alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Northern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 09 at 3:32AM EST until December 11 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches possible. * WHERE...In New York, Northern St. Lawrence and Eastern Clinton Counties. In Vermont, Grand Isle, Western Franklin and Western Chittenden Counties. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially during the pre-dawn hours into the morning hours on Monday. The hazardous conditions are likely to impact the Monday morning commute. Scattered power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy rain overnight Sunday is expected to change over to heavy, wet snow during the pre-dawn hours on Monday. Snowfall rates on Monday morning could exceed 1 inch per hour. Furthermore, gusty northwest winds 25 to 35 mph could produce additional power outages on Monday afternoon into Monday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
